Package it.polimi.ingsw.am42.view.gui.controller

Class WinningController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am42.view.gui.controller.WinningController
public class WinningController extends Object
This class represents the GUI controller that controls the winning phase, during which the Player sees the winner(s) and the general standings of the game with all the player's points

      public void sendMessage(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      This method sends a ChatMessage. It takes all the information from the Java FX text field and from the Java FX choice box
      Parameters:
